channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024010493
item.description:
Report X-2024010493

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DAMAGED PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR ON PD-3 SECTION DURING THE TWILIGHT SORT. PACKAGE AND CONTENTS WERE A HAZMAT FLAMABLE LIQUID DAMAGE. PACKAGE WAS DAMP BUT NO LIQUID LEAKING FROM PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET CLEAN UP PROCEDURES AND PLACED PACKAGE AND CONTENTS IN DMP TRAY. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMN PROCESSING AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
